subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Hunter Mahan holed an 81-yard approach shot on No. 9 for his third eagle of the round yesterday — and second on a par 4 — at the Canadian Open in Markham, Ontario. Mahan also holed out from 189 yards on No. 18 and made a more routine eagle with a 10-foot putt on the par-5 No. 11. He finished with a nine-under 62 to match the tournament record and take a two-stroke lead over Steve Allan of Australia.
